crypto.name: BackToTheFORK
crypto.desc:
Try to find out what is the key used by our strong encryption system. If you are able to find it, decrypt the flag!

P.S. the solver script could run for ~10 minutes. Please, make the script parallel, otherwise it could take more than 30 minutes. If you receive TIMEOUT errors, please contact us.

crypto.name: Colorful Gabibbos
crypto.desc:
I managed to get my hands on two secret images from the Gabibbos, but they're encrypted. Can you help me decrypt them?

The first one was straightforward, it turned out to be a photo of a well-known member but the second one is a bit more difficult.

crypto.name: In tun Group di Esperts
crypto.desc: Unfortunately it is not so easy to communicate with a person who speaks only in Friulan language.

crypto.name: Jurassic bank
crypto.desc:
Dinosaurs went extinct because they didn't care much about their future, our bank though has provided the best way to save money since the jurassic!

Jurassic Bank, since 170 million years ago.

crypto.name: Mega secure
crypto.desc: My friend keeps bragging about how "mega secure" his new encryption system is, but is it really as secure as he thinks?

crypto.name: This iS not PN
crypto.desc: I'm a symmetric cryptography expert and I think permutation networks are always impossible to break, no matter of what components are used.

misc.name: Encoded Party
misc.desc:
A boring promoter stopped me while I was walking to sell me a ticket for a party. He said it was going to be crazy... but I don't know if I should trust him!

Can you tell me who's playing?

misc.name: RoboTank
misc.desc:
RoboTank is back! And he's stronger then ever!

Last year only one team was able to pwn our favourite tank, but this year nobody, nobody will win!

Why? Try and pwn our RoboTank while a team of experts is constantly changing the server's parameters every 5 minutes.

Watch out! We think someone is corrupting them! Follow the live stream on YouTube: https://2024.snakectf.org/robotank-live

What are those cards? Mmmh, it seems Minesweeper, but slightly different.

Since it's our game, we make the rules

    Do not go outside the arena
    Do not harm RoboTank
    Each card will contain a tuple (x,y) where x is the number of adjacent bombs and y is the number of adjacent pieces of flag.
    Bombs will disable the tank for 5 minutes
    Do not create multiple CTFd accounts to solve RoboTank, otherwise you will be banned!

Have fun!

misc.name: Stressful Reader 2
misc.desc: I really, really, really want to read the $FLAG but why is it so stressful?

misc.name: Stressful Reader 3
misc.desc: OMG this is a nightmare! Something has changed again! Will it be easier this time?

misc.name: ordinary keyboard
misc.desc:
Just your usual keyboard challenge.

Try to parse this.

net.name: Cloudflared
net.desc: I started self-hosting some of my web projects on my old PC, each with a different domain name. I asked a friend what he thought about that, and he said he could only see one. Can you guess which one it is?

net.name: Remote storage
net.desc: All my homies hate cloud storage.

net.name: Router capture
net.desc: We are developing a new router with military grade security. So, we have captured wifi and wan traffic from the router. Try to break our encryption.

osint.name: Young Wannabe
osint.desc: Last week ordered a new wallet on Snamazon, but instead, I received a strange message, a packet of matches and a business card from a JēdrarCEO...

pwn.name: Guessing Pro
pwn.desc: The title says "Pro", but this is a baby challenge. Everybody likes guessing after all.

pwn.name: Native Coffee Interface
pwn.desc: My coffee machine kept getting hacked, so I added a Java wrapper to make it more secure.

pwn.name: Pwny Trivia
pwn.desc: I tried to write my own trivia game b/c I was bored, now I'm considering to sell it!

pwn.name: TLN
pwn.desc:
Yet another notes challenge...

No heap this time I promise 😉

pwn.name: calc.exe
pwn.desc: What's this calc.exe everyone is talking about?

rev.name: Annuitka
rev.desc:
Python is slow but simple. C is fast but complex.

What if you could have the best of both worlds?

To run the chall use this Dockerfile

FROM python:3.12.5-bullseye

RUN pip3 install --no-cache-dir cryptography
COPY chall /chall

ENTRYPOINT ["/chall"]

rev.name: Funtran
rev.desc: My father was a programmer and his father too, I don't see why I should change their ways.

rev.name: Rainbow Dragon Road
rev.desc:
I found a new circuit, do you want to try to complete it?

It's a very long road to the end, but I'm sure you can do it!

web.name: Film Library
web.desc: I made this little app to track the movies I watch.

web.name: Meme Gallery
web.desc: Share your favorite memes with the admins.
